comment.author: 7278052@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Croton-on-Hudson, New York, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Can the photos from Croton Point and the Croton Dump be added to the group? That would be great.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi Libraryrivergirl,

Sure, you can include these photos in your group.  These are really interesting images.  Good luck with your group!

- Jill (U.S. National Archives)
